title: Unspecified Error Has Occurred
body: Since Patch 6.15 I have been receiving the Unspecified Error has occurred message when ever I would try to patch the game. I have uninstalled and reinstalled 3 times now and it hasn't worked. I've looked all around the internet trying to find a solution and nothing has worked. Please help. I can supply logs and everything I just really need to get this fixed.

replies.body: I'd like to help out but could use some more information!  The error could mean different things depending on where in the patcher status you're at.  At what percent are you receiving the error, or do you have a screenshot?  Let me know!

Before I was getting it at 33%, but now I sometimes get it at 32%, or 6%.
It's usually when it scans files.

Thanks for the follow up!  At this point, your patcher is trying to scan game files but is being blocked. As a first step, I suggest going over our  [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)Guide.  This should restore access and get you all fixed up.  Let me know if you still have issues!
So like I said I'm still having the same issue and I'd like to get this fixed ASAP, because school starts next week and I wont have time to get this fixed.

Hit us up in a ticket, and our tech team can dig into this.  Gather a set of logs with the  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to help provide some more context.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as possible.

Okay will do, thank you so much! I really appreciate everything you did to help. We all appreciate everything you guys at Riot do. Whether the community says it or not.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Alright so I scanned and repaired my harddrive and the error is still happening. I have done everything on that page.
Please help.
